name: Jixel's Torture
description:
Jixel's Torture

Why is Jixel receiving torture? No one knows, including him...but he's gotta deal with it.

Jixel was placed in a fiery pit with hellish flames at the very bottom. In order to survive and (maybe?) see daylight once again, he must make jumps for his life. And boy, jumping can be hard sometimes.

Jump to survive, don't fall into the fire. Sounds easy right? Well, it's actually torture.

Controls:

  • Arrows (or A&D): move
  • Spacebar: jump

A game I made in a little less than 8 hours. Hopefully you'll enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it :)
